display.title: Cobblemon
description: As you may have already noticed when looking around you, the Cobblemon modpack introduces pokémon into minecraft!

These pokémon can be caught during battle as a turn use, or alternatively outside of battle by throwing a pokéball with &&bright click&&r (though your chances are lower). &&6Battles can only be fought when you have a pokémon, so make sure to choose your starter with the &&b[Open Summary] &&6key!
